attributes.action: Gary Speed to be awarded Sports Personality of the Year 2012 posthumously
attributes.additional_details: In the light of the tragic and untimely death of Gary Speed undoubtedly a great sporting professional and talent, we urge the Government to persuade the BBC to award the Sports Personality of the Year 2012 posthumously to Gary Speed.

rejection.details: The Sports Personality of the Year Award is a matter for the BBC and the Government cannot have any influence over who the recipient of the award should be.
